title: Stuffed pork with mushrooms wrapped in pancetta with a lettuce salad
ingredients: ['handful chestnut mushrooms, roughly chopped', '1 clove garlic, crushed', 'salt and pepper', '1 pork fillet', '1 tablespoon chopped flat leaf or curly parsley', '6 slices smoked pancetta or streaky bacon', 'oil as needed', '2 knobs butter', '1/4 head garden lettuce', '1/2 onion, sliced', '2 radish, thinly sliced', 'dressing made from equal parts extra virgin olive oil and white wine vinegar', '1 glass dry sherry or Marsala wine']
